document.full_text: thousands of supporters of nigerian president goodluck jonathan were bussed to a square in the capital abuja on saturday for his final campaign rally before a presidential election in two weeks' time.
document.title: nigerian president's campaign finale draws thousands
lines_and_colors: thousands of supporters of nigerian president goodluck jonathan were bussed to a square in the capital abuja on saturday for his final campaign rally before a presidential election in two weeks' time.
